name: Ultimate Puzzles China
description: Ultimate Puzzles China is a puzzle collection that is completely about China. You have to reconcile various places in China. Each of the four puzzles is made up of 16 square pieces. which are placed on a 4 x 4 grid. You can turn each piece by clicking on it to bring it to the right orientation. Once a puzzle piece has been placed in the correct position, it locks in place. If you try to place a piece on an element of the grid it will jump back to the periphery where other pieces are located.
